# Getting started {#sec-gettingstarted .unnumbered}

This section covers some basic aspects of the project and steps that your lab will need to complete **BEFORE you set up and run the experiment**.

::: callout-important
# Green-Lighting

**All labs (regardless of experience) must complete the green-lighting process outlined in the following sections and be given EXPLICIT approval by project leads to begin official data collection.**[^getting-started-1]
:::

[^getting-started-1]: Labs are welcome and encouraged to collect pilot data as part of the set-up process before being completing the "green-lighting" process, but this data will not be included in the analyses.
